title: Can i play with this pc?
body:
i should be able to play  ok with this computer? : 

4 GB RAM
intel core i3 cpu m 370 2.40ghz
64-bits
intel hd graphics

 pls help

replies.body: I couldn't make any promises as every computer is unique, but I'd like to offer some direction.  Bookmark our[ recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide and keep it handy while you look, and it will help selecting the right pick for you.  Good luck!
